1.16.5.1.0.3-1.16.5:
12/04/2022: Scimitar Update

• Added diamethyst scimitars.
• Updated textures of hilts, swords, and battle axes.
• Fixed an issue with changing weapon speeds in the config.
1.16.5.1.0.2-1.16.5:
11/28/2022

• Added the ability to adjust the base armor protection levels for each armor piece in the config.
• Horse armors can now be configured individually.
1.16.5.1.0.1-1.16.5:
10/23/2022: Prismarine Update

• Added prismarine weapons, tools, armor, and horse armor.
• Prismarine swords, sickles, battle axes, and bows do more damage when wet.
• Prismarine armor provides players a better underwater experience.
• Prismarine horse armor allows horses to be ridden in water.
1.16.5.0.1.1-1.16.5:
08/23/2022

• Fixed a server crash that could occur when drinking certain potions.
1.16.5.0.1.0-1.16.5:
08/20/2022: Caves & Cliffs Backport Update

• Initial beta release of the 1.16.5 version. The Caves & Cliffs Backport mod 1.16.5-7.2.0 is a required dependency.

1.17.1.1.5.5-1.17.1:
12/04/2022: Scimitar Update

• Added diamethyst scimitars.
• Updated textures of hilts, swords, and battle axes.
• Fixed an issue with changing weapon speeds in the config.
1.17.1.1.5.4-1.17.1:
11/28/2022

• Added the ability to adjust the base armor protection levels for each armor piece in the config.
• Horse armors can now be configured individually.
1.17.1.1.5.3-1.17.1:
10/23/2022: Prismarine Update

• Added prismarine weapons, tools, armor, and horse armor.
• Prismarine swords, sickles, battle axes, and bows do more damage when wet.
• Prismarine armor provides players a better underwater experience.
• Prismarine horse armor allows horses to be ridden in water.
1.17.1.1.5.2-1.17.1:
08/20/2022

• Diamethyst arrows can now be fired from dispensers.
1.17.1.1.5.1-1.17.1:
07/12/2022

• Fixed an issue with the Diamethyst Bow bonus damage configuration options.
1.17.1.1.5.0-1.17.1:
06/24/2022: Chainmail Armor Update

• Added three new chainmail armor options - gold, iron, and copper.
• Added gold, iron, and copper chainmail horse armor.
• Horse armor now shows the protection level given to the horse.
• Added a new Chain Link Maker tool that is used to craft the chain links for the new armors.
• Added a copper nugget which should be interchangeable with copper nuggets from other mods.
• Most metal armors and materials can now be melted down into nuggets.
• Fixed a bug that prevented the crafting of Diamethyst Crystals. Oops!
1.17.1.1.4.3-1.17.1:
06/18/2022

• Added a configurable option to the Diamethyst Diamond Arrow so that it can now freeze water on contact. It also produces snowflake particles as it flies.
1.17.1.1.4.2-1.17.1:
06/12/2022

• Added a Diamethyst Charged Copper Arrow. The arrow discharges at the point of impact causing a lightning strike. To charge copper arrows, fire them into a Diamethyst block and get lightning to strike the block.
• Fixed some arrow state persistence issues.
1.17.1.1.4.1-1.17.1:
06/03/2022

Small bug fix to the 1.4.0 release.
1.17.1.1.4.0-1.17.1:
06/03/2022: Archery Update

• Added a full range of diamethyst bows each with special abilities. The bows fire diamethyst arrows at a higher velocity and can zoom in further while aiming.
• Added a selection of diamethyst arrows that affect hit enemies and/or blocks in different ways.
• Added diamethyst shards that can be found randonly in chests scattered throughout the world. The shards can be used for arrow creation, ground into dust, or combined to make diamethyst crystals. Diamethyst crystals can now be broken into shards instead of dust. Diamethyst dust can no longer be returned into crystal form because... you know... it's dust!
• Added a missing lapis armor story advancement.
1.17.1.1.3.1-1.17.1:
05/27/2022

• Piglins can now be distracted by all gold based diamethyst items.
• Implemented the forge mod version checking system.
• Changed the mod file name and version format.
1.17.1.1.3.0-1.17.1:
05/24/2022: Stabby, Webby, Reachy update

• Added a diamethyst knife. This short, stubby weapon has a fast attack speed, low attack damage, low durability, and cannot be enchanted. It is, however, extremely efficient at cutting through cobwebs without taking damage, and can cause extra strings to drop.
• Added extended reach to all diamethyst tools, which increases based upon the materials used in the tool's construction. The enhancement only affects the tool's utility function and does not extend attack range.
• Made some minor adjustments to the textures of swords, sickles, and hilts.
• Diamethyst clusters can now be harvested intact by silk touch enchanted tools.
• Added the missing lapis armor advancement.
1.17.1.1.2.3-1.17.1:
05/16/2022

• Added back some missing netherite smithing recipes. (thanks justkeepmining)
1.17.1.1.2.2-1.17.1:
05/11/2022

• Modified the lapis weapon confusion effect so it is more effective against mobs.
• Fixed how the copper sword and sickle were being displayed while held in third person view.
• Fixed a bug that prevented the netherite weapon fire damage effect from working correctly.
1.17.1.1.2.1-1.17.1:
05/07/2022

• Fixed an issue with the copper plate recipe not working as expected.
• Added missing copper advancements.
1.17.1.1.2.0-1.17.1:
05/03/2022: Lapis Update

• Added lapis lazuli weapons, tools, armor, and horse armor.
1.17.1.1.1.0-1.17.1:
04/25/2022: Battle Axe Update

• Added diamethyst battle axes.
• Added copper weapons, tools, armor, and horse armor.

04/22/2022: Official Release

• Added copper weapons, tools, armor, and horse armor.
1.18.2.0.4.0-1.18.2:
04/18/2022: Budding Diamethyst Update

• Added budding diamethyst blocks.
• Added twice brewed budding brew potion.
• Updated all potion advancements.
1.18.2.0.3.0-1.18.2:
04/15/2022: Horse Armor Update

• Added craftable diamethyst horse armor in gold, iron, emerald, and diamond.
1.18.2.0.2.2-1.18.2:
04/14/2022

• Piglins are now neutral to diamethyst golden armor.
• Updated the iron pickaxe texture.
1.18.2.0.2.1-1.18.2:
04/12/2022

• Fixed the attack speed of the diamethyst netherite sickle.
1.18.2.0.2.0-1.18.2:
04/11/2022

• Added netherite upgrade options to all diamethyst diamond weapons, tools, and armor.

1.19.1.5.7-1.19:
12/09/2022

• Support for 1.19.2 was accidentally disabled in 1.5.5. It has been re-enabled in this version.
